turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I am looking to order a coffee beverage from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a tall caffè Americano.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Woodland Ave location in Philadelphia.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, let me send your order to that location, one moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a tall caffe americano to be picked up at the starbucks on woodland avenue in philadelphia, your receipt will be texted to you and your drink will be ready in 7 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
